newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Israeli soldiers kill Palestinian - witnesses.
newsitem.headline: Israeli soldiers kill Palestinian - witnesses.

text.p: Israeli soldiers shot and killed a Palestinian teenager in the West Bank on Tuesday during stone-throwing demonstrations following the death of an Arab villager last night, witnesses said.
They said Abdallah Qaraqe, 19, from Sinjil village was shot in the neck and died on arrival at Ramallah hospital.

Palestinians said stone-throwing started in Sinjil on Tuesday over the killing on Monday night of a local merchant by assailants in a car with Israeli license plates who fired a rocket at his vehicle on a bypass road used by Jewish settlers.
They said Israeli soldiers fired at the demonstrators, killing Qaraqe.
An Israeli army spokeswoman said she was checking the report.

Sixty Palestinians and 15 Israeli soldiers were killed last month during fierce gun battles and stone-throwing clashes that erupted over the policies of Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu towards Palestinians.
